addFounders(address,address[],uint256[],.details: addFounders add founders to the organization.     this function can be called only after forgeOrg and before setSchemes

params._founders: An array with the addresses of the founders of the organization
params._foundersReputationAmount: An array of amount of reputation that the  founders receive in the new organization
params._foundersTokenAmount: An array of amount of tokens that the founders receive in the new organization

params._orgName: The name of the new organization
params._tokenName: The name of the token associated with the organization
